item.title: Potholes and debris everywhere on chad road, 1st March

item.title: Streets lights out, 1st March
item.description:
Street lights are out by the Cheltenham Society of Model Engineers. This is particularly dangerous as there is a very wide, long and deep pothole (reported) in this area, and new calming measures have been installed that are difficult to see in the dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
